doc.name: Limiter
doc.description: Produce an output token on each firing with a value that is equal to the input if the input lies between the bottom and top parameters. Otherwise, if the input is greater than top, output top. If the input is less than bottom, output bottom. This actor operates on scalar types only.
doc.author: Edward A. Lee
doc.property: The bottom of the limiting range. This is a scalar with default value 0.0.
The top of the limiting range. This is a scalar with default value 1.0.
